subject: Re: A file from a Radio Shack Session today
author: judy_in_hollywood
full_text:
--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Steve Hultay" <urkel23@...> wrote:
>
> 
> I got a very good session through the 12-470 radio today on AM.  I had 
> asked our technicians Mike and Lisa if they can bring John Lennon 
> foward to speak with me and they did.  John Lennon has been my idol 
> all my life and today is the 27 year anniversary of his death.  Mike 
> and Lisa work very well with me in contacting the ones i try to get 
> to.  In the next post you will hear the file i got, which may be the 
> best file i ever got with any radio or box.  I asked if John was aware 
> of how he died and he responded "Yes, Bullet".  As everyone probably 
> knows that John Lennon was shot outside his home in NYC in 1980.  I 
> can't believe that our friends on the other side are so comfortable 
> with me, that they keep exceeding my expectations of what i will hear 
> through any of these devices.  I also have other files from this 
> session, but this was the most important one and proves that i am 
> speaking with spirits on another plane.
> 
> -Steve H.
>
 = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = WOW! Steve, congratulations on contacting John Lennon, that's SOoooo Cool! I hope he can continue to give some messages, so as to prove life after death and help us communicate with the Spirit Entities there!  <[8-D    =Judy=
